document_data.name: Thelokassyil
document_data.mainbody: '''Thelokassyil''' was a [[sahuagin]] baron, who advised King [[Ixilthetocal]].
document_data.Description: The baron was very xenophobic, hating outsiders. He believed that non-sahuagin [[humanoid]]s were no more worthy than crab meat, and were only useful for consumption or sacrifices.
document_data.Combat: The baron fought with three main weapons: a [[quarterstaff]], a [[spear]] and a [[crossbow]]. The crossbow was loaded with [[poison]]ous ''[[bolt of biting|bolts of biting]]''.
document_data.History: Old sahuagin tales told of outsiders who would decide the fate of the [[City of Caverns]]. [[Gorion's Ward]] may have arrived in the city with his adventuring party, and the baron advised his monarch to kill them.
